overview: Geoff Bastow is founder and CEO of Thin Air Software LLC, a provider of out-sourced software development, and Convergent Commerce Group LLC, a network of online B2B directories for small-to-mid-sized businesses seeking greater exposure and engagement. Previously, he was principal, senior vice president and CTO of Mortgagebot LLC, offering Internet-based solutions to the mortgage industry, that had been spun out of M&I Marshall and Ilsley Corporation. He was both the architect of Mortgagebotâ€™s software products and of its privatization strategy. Bastow also founded or co-founded technology companies Tushaus Computer Services and Doral Systems Corporation. Mortgagebot, Doral and Tushaus were named to the Inc. 500 in their first year of eligibility. He attended the University of Michigan in physics and computer science.
